Uses of Class
com.asemantics.rdfcoder.repository.Repository.Resource

Packages that use Repository.Resource
com.asemantics.rdfcoder This package contains the CommandLine access point and the High Level API interface ( RDFCoder ). 
com.asemantics.rdfcoder.repository This package defines utility classes to handle a file system repository able to store and organize the library data.

Methods in com.asemantics.rdfcoder that return Repository.Resource
protected  Repository.Resource Model.retrieveResource(String rn)
          Retrieves the resource with the given name.
